boat.construction_details: Epoxy sheathed western redwood cedar strip
boat.full_description: A Selway Fisher designed assymetrical "Baby Raven" open canoe, built with western redwood cedar strip planking, and sheathed inside and out with glass and epoxy. Used for canoe club events including white water trips. Also for longer solo expeditions such as paddling/camping the whole length of the non-tidal Thames from Cricklade to Richmond (about 145 miles), and a circular tour from Glen Finnian, down Loch Shiel, into Loch Moidart and round the coast to Loch Ailort and (with a portage) into Loch Elit (about 65 miles)
boat.name: Orca
boat.short_description: A self built open canoe used for club events and longer expeditions.
